mapper.select: SELECT p.PROJECT_NO, t.TASK_NO, p.PROJECT_TITLE , t.TASK_TITLE , t.TASK_START , t.TASK_END FROM PROJECT p , TASK t , (SELECT ROWNUM rn, PROJECT_NO , TASK_NO FROM USER_TASK_MANY WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}) utm WHERE p.PROJECT_NO = utm.PROJECT_NO AND t.TASK_NO = utm.TASK_NO AND p.PROJECT_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY TASK_END
